thread.section_title: Life Style Sports Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Life Style Sports | lifestylesports.com
thread.title: David O Connor
thread.title_full: Life Style Sports reviewed by David O Connor

author: David O Connor
title: David O Connor
text: I was really impressed by Lifestyle. I wanted a pair of running shoes that I saw on the website but the Westport shop did not have them in stock. I was pleasantly surpried when they were able to have them the very next morning without any extra costs. Also thanks to the Westport staff as they were really helpful and professional. Well done..I will buy again from Lifestyle.
